EmailTemplate.name: 17.ComColl.SDP.none.N.G.N.14762.SDP Pilot campaign.SSE_ENG_4_Operational_eBook
EmailTemplate.subject: Want to achieve a more agile and efficient network?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Three keys to a more cost-effective network Nokia has helped modernize and simplify some of the world’s largest, most complex networks. We draw on that experience to guide you, the Head of Network Engineering, through a critical stage of your network evolution. Our latest eBook will show you how our Secure Service Enablement from Nokia software can make your network better by addressing challenges related to:
- Equipment interoperability - Speed of integration - Flexibility to evolve Enjoy! Brendan Ziolo Head of Secure Service Enablement Marketing, Nokia Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> You are receiving this email because you've subscribed to receive information from Nokia.
